MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Varieties of Inner Speech Questionnaire

Reference:
McCarthy-Jones, S., Fernyhough, C. (2011). The varieties of inner speech: links between quality of inner speech and psychopathological variables in a sample of young adults. Consciousness and cognition, 20(4), 1586-1593. doi:10.1016/j.concog.2011.08.005

Assessing facets of inner speech: Dialogic inner speech, The voice of others in the inner speech, Condensed inner speech, and Evaluative/Motivational inner speech.

VIS_other_sum.Description: The voice of others in the inner speech
